abstract: Supreme Court Chief Justice John G Roberts Jr angers conservatives and liberals by voting again in favor of Obama administration's health care law and dissenting from decision establishing constitutional right to same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: John G. Roberts Jr., the leader of the deeply divided Supreme Court, used his votes on health care and same-sex marriage to cast himself as a consistent practitioner of judicial modesty.

headline.main: Angering Conservatives and Liberals, Chief Justice John Roberts Defends Steady Restraint
headline.print_headline: Angering Conservatives and Liberals, Chief Justice Defends Steady Restraint

snippet: John G. Roberts Jr., the leader of the deeply divided Supreme Court, used his votes on health care and same-sex marriage to cast himself as a consistent practitioner of judicial modesty.
